desc: Welcome to TheCandleMaker. We offer best quality candles handmade with 100% soy wax all biodegradable & sustainable. Our eco-soy wax specifically exhibits an superb scent throw. If you are an astrology fan, why not buy a zodiac sign scented candle. We have candles for every season! Made in Brentwood, Essex, London UK.

layout.text: If you are an astrology fan, why not show it with a zodiac sign scented candle?
